name: British Mazdaznan Magazine (IAPSOP)
content:
British Mazdaznan Magazine (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: British Mazdaznan Magazine Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: British Mazdaznan Magazine. The Official Organ of the Mazdaznan Association in Great Britain. 1925-1938? Monthly Manchester, then London, England. Editor: Lt.-Col. Arthur F. Gault. 1/1, 1925. 6/- a year, 48-68 pp. This was published in Manchester by the association that in 1914-1915 had published a quarterly journal of the same name. Devoted to the teachings of Dr. O.Z. Ha'nish. Universiteit van Amsterdam; Utrecht University Library. Issues:British Mazdaznan Magazine V10 N7 Mar 1934 British Mazdaznan Magazine V14 N10 Jun 1938
